metadata.synopsis: Wyll wasn't present at Karlach recruitment, reacts to her in the party with a follow up in the camp.

1.speaker: Wyll
1.text: Hells. It's her - Karlach, the archdevil's servant. We must rest in camp. It's time she had her due.

0.speaker: Karlach
0.text: Shit. I just can't shake you, can I?
